name: SomfyProtect
0:
”Alexa, ask Somfy to arm the alarm.”
”Alexa, ask Somfy to enable night mode.”
”Alexa, ask Somfy what happened this week.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: somfy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Thanks to the Somfy Protect Skill, you are now able to control your Somfy One, Somfy Home Alarm and Somfy Security Camera using your voice. 

With the skill you can: 
- arm and disarm the alarm,
- enable the night mode,
- open and close your Somfy One or Security Camera shutter,
- have a quick summary of the daily events or the weekly events.

Everything is secured with the passcode that you set, there’s no risk of your child disarming the alarm!

You will need the Somfy Protect mobile app with an account already set up to use this skill.
